name: Tank Arena (Jack Mitchell)
description: Tank Arena is a one-on-one battle that lasts for two minutes.  Player 1 (green) uses WASD to move and F to shoot.  Player 2 (red) uses the arrow keys to move and slash to shoot.  Every time your shot hits your opponent, you score a point!  Watch out for the dangerous X-shaped mines, if you run into one you damage yourself and your opponent scores a point!  Keep an eye out for the dark gray walls that you can shoot down or drive through.  After two minutes, the tank with the most points wins!
